basic.blooming: Flowering period October-May, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color purple, red, orange, yellow, bicolor

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Poor flowering without adequate sunlight, but properly shade under strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water less frequently in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves and withered flowers
